item.title: Closed!
item.dc:creator: @Legit_Gltich Legit Gltich
item.description:
@Legit_Gltich wrote:

WO0t thanks alot chassy

one more quick question is there any way to add no item? like this

[code]public static int TzHaarHur[] = { , , , , , , 6528};

public static int randomTzHaarHur()
{
	return TzHaarHur[(int)(Math.random()*TzHaarHur.length)];
}[/code]

I know this doesn’t work but is there something like this
or should i switch it to you get 99 tokkul everytime and do this

[code]public static int TzHaarHur[] = { 6528, 6529, 6529 etc…};

public static int randomTzHaarHur()
{
	return TzHaarHur[(int)(Math.random()*TzHaarHur.length)];
}[/code]

item.title: Closed!
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

[quote=“xray veeo, post:5, topic:251648”][quote author=chassy13 link=topic=332213.msg2592181#msg2592181 date=1229825580]

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2600) { ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomTzHaarHur(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); ItemHandler.addItem(6529, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 100, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); }

If you want it harder to get obby things, just add more ID’s to your static int.
[/quote]
you’re the most helpful people on these forums chassy, welcome to my cool people list.[/quote]

Thanks mate.

Read full topic

item.title: Closed!
item.dc:creator: @Legit_Gltich Legit Gltich
item.description:
@Legit_Gltich wrote:

Hey, i’m trying to get my fighting caves working so adding drops for all of the TzHaar people.

Code: From Item2

[code]public static int TzHaarHur[] = {6529, 6529, 6529, 6529, 6529, 6529, 6524};

public static int randomTzHaarHur()
{
	return TzHaarHur[(int)(Math.random()*TzHaarHur.length)];
}[/code]

Code: From NCPHandler

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2600) { ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomTzHaarHur(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); }

6529=Tokkul
6524=Obby Sheild

How would i get it so that it drops 100 tokkul per kill?
How would i get it so that it drops 100 tokkul per kill and an obby shield?

                                    Any help will be greatly appreciated or even a guess  
                                                           ~Legit Gltich~

Read full topic
